catcall.title: CATCALLS OF AMS
catcall.content: An interactive map application for existing initiatives fighting street harassment. Main features: visualizing data, serve as a platform to report new catcalls and manage/verify incoming catcalls as moderator. This would be a data solution for Catcalls of Amsterdam, which is part of a global movement of 150 local initiatives. Hoping to launch January 2021.
catcall.stack: Stack: NodeJs, Koa, MongoDB, GraphQL, React and Mapbox

bookclub.title: UNDER CONSTRUCTION: BOOK CLUB
bookclub.content: During covid-19 times, I started reading to friends and family over Whatsapp. We collectively read a book by me sending a small recording each day. Because of its success, I thought there would be a better way to share my audio files amongst the people of this Book Club. Biggest challenge: working with audio and keeping track of the user's progress within each audio file.
bookclub.stack: Stack: NodeJS, Express, MongoDB Atlas, Bootstrap.
